data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Balqa, Jordan to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Balqa, Jordan
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Balqa
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Balqa, Jordan by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Balqa, Jordan a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Adyghe people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Adyghe people know you.
Spirit, please defend the 1,089 believers in Balqa against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.
Spirit, help the fearful in Balqa, Jordan to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Balqa, Jordan has a population of 409,500.

We estimate Balqa has 1,089 people who might know Jesus, 8,235 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 400,176 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 376 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Balqa, Jordan that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.
